Name: EllrLand
About the game: [figure 1] 'Ailu'-meaning children of elves and human beings. In the forest on this continent, there is a happy family of three. Nicole, eight, is regarded as a treasure by his father Elon. After returning from a hunting trip, Elon found that his home had been broken into, and his daughter was missing. The original happy home lost the laughter and joy of the past. The trace left by the Elon tracker intruders found that it was the footprints of the demon, and the footprints extended into the depths of the jungle, Although the demons in the deep jungle are terrible, he decided to embark on an unknown and dangerous journey for his daughter. Game Features · Fine art original paintings · Vivid animation performance · Rich and deep strategy The game has content [/] 2 different professions. 3 powerful pets More than 170 different cards. More than 140 artifacts. More than 50 mysterious events. Weekly challenge mode, want to play something different? New challenges are created every week, and the deck that can best meet the challenges is formed. Endless mode, still meaningless? Want to try how strong your deck is? Match your score against players from all over the world.
Developers: Sichuan fruit Interactive Technology Co., Ltd
Publishers: Sichuan fruit Interactive Technology Co., Ltd
